Description:
To be successful you will need to meet the following:Open to candidates willing to relocate to Saudi Arabia who has previous experience in KSA.
Minimum 10+ years of Sales experience within the agricultural industry in KSA/MEA. R&D background within Agriculture/ Foodtech/ Biological science is a plus.
Strong understanding of the agricultural market in Saudi including knowledge of market ranges and competitors. 
Results-oriented, self-motivated, and sales-driven individual.
Proven track record of driving sales revenues and achieving market growth targets on a YoY basis.
Fluency in English and Arabic is a must.Job Details
